p: PAM-expanded Vγ9Vδ2-T cells were activated with an anti-γδ-TCR mAb (0.5 µg/ml) in vitro for 6 h, and then the subsets of CD137 + and CD137 − Vγ9Vδ2-T cells were isolated by selection using the MACS CD137 MicroBead Kit (Miltenyi Biotec, Germany) according to the manufacturer’s instructions. The purities of the resulting cell populations were checked routinely by flow cytometry. CD137 + and CD137 − Vγ9Vδ2-T cells purities generally exceeded 95%.
